metadata.title: CVE-2022-47085 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in ostree before 2022.7 allows attackers to cause adenial of service or other unspecified impacts via the print_panic functionin repo_checkout_filter.rs.

criterions.comment: ostree: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
